item.title: 317 Help
item.dc:creator: @coder_conner coder conner
item.description:
@coder_conner wrote:

change that “C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe” -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit to “C:/Program files (x86)/java/jdk1.6.0_20/bin/java.exe” -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit(or what ever jdk you have)
also put this cache file in ur client. http://www.mediafire.com/?i1ygdninmlj

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Help
item.dc:creator: @db0wzz db0wzz
item.description:
@db0wzz wrote:

Hey so i need this run command in order to play my server, which is my run right now.

@echo off
“C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe” -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

Other People need to use

@echo off
Start Javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

So i tried uploading a client with the Start Javaw run.bat, and whenever people run it, they get an error on the client “Downloading Cache - Retrying in 10…”
and it never loads.

any help?

Read full topic
